name: Planet X (antonsutherland)
description:
A mini FPS game made for the game development course.

Controls:

MovementA, W, S, DChange weaponMouse wheelShootLeft mouseJumpSpace

Modifications made:

  1. 3 comprehensive levels: fight on the surface in level 1, then try to escape a maze-like level 2. Level 3 is a boss fight.
  2. New menu style;
  3. Environment changes:
    • new skybox with stars;
    • added fog  to level 3;
    • new scene lighting.
